articles.description: Athletic had the third-meanest defence in La Liga but they were beaten by Aubameyang on 37 minutes after he connected with a loose ball in the area after Gerard Pique's header.
articles.content:
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scored again as Barcelona went goal crazy for the third game running, thrashing Athletic Bilbao 4-0 to go back to fourth in the table.
Barça have now scored 12 goals in the… [+2668 chars]

articles.title: SIR CLIVE WOODWARD: The next two matches will show if Eddie Jones' men are a first division outfit - Daily Mail
articles.description:
Now the dust has settled, England are in decent shape and will unquestionably start as underdogs against Ireland 
that is a dynamic they will enjoy as they head into final two Six Nations ties.
articles.content: England find themselves at a crossroads as they contemplate the final two matches of the Six Nations. Can they claim a place in the first division of that tournament with Ireland and France or are th… [+6248 chars]

articles.title: West Ham stars warm up in supportive shirts for Ukraine's Yarmolenko - Daily Mail
articles.description: Yarmolenko, the captain of Ukraine's football team, has been granted compassionate leave by his club to help him take time to come to terms with the devastating turn of events in his homeland.
